Uses of Interface
org.springframework.expression.Expression

  • Packages that use Expression 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.expression
    Core abstractions behind the Spring Expression Language.
    org.springframework.expression.common
    Common utility classes behind the Spring Expression Language.
    org.springframework.expression.spel.standard
    SpEL's standard parser implementation.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Expression ExpressionParser.parseExpression(java.lang.String expressionString)
      Parse the expression string and return an Expression object you can use for repeated evaluation.

      Parse the expression string and return an Expression object you can use for repeated evaluation.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpelExpression
      A SpelExpression represents a parsed (valid) expression that is ready to be evaluated in a specified context.
